Direct message the job poster from Cubiq Recruitment
Mat Holliday
Building Machine Learning & NLP Teams in the US 🚀🌎- Follow me for AI & ML roles m.holliday@cubiqrecruitment.com 🍹Self appointed Culture & Social…
Director, Machine Learning $250,000 - 350,000 + bonuses & equity PermanentNew York City, NY (remote possible) We're partnered with a stealth mode startup who are positioned to be a global challenger to the generative AI space and they are looking to add a Senior Engineering Manager or Director level appointment to their team to focus on their natural language product.From a team perspective, they operate in a free and experimental way, the major difference from their competitors is they allow staff & engineers complete freedom to conduct experiments by learning from both successes and failures to develop highly scalable and state-of-the-art algorithms that will be used by millions of people globally.You will manage a team of ML, data engineers and full-stack developers, including hiring, performance and career mentoring and sets the direction for a scientific, data driven approach for decision making in application development.To be successful in this role you will have excellent knowledge of at least one of the Deep Learning frameworks like PyTorch or Tensorflow and the ability to leverage open domain pretrained models for NLP applications. You will have worked in a Principal Engineer or Senior Manager level previously, ideally within a startup leveraging natural language, recommender systems or content generationWe’re currently attracting subject matter experts from Facebook, Amazon, Apple & Spotify, and we’re keen to hear from candidates who’ve worked on similar projects scaling up large systems (all applications considered).In return you will have the opportunity to take a key leadership position within a startup that looks set to take LLM focused tech global to enterprise and SME clients alike. A generous salary between $250,000 - 350,000 + bonuses and a leading equity package are on offer. ** If you're interested in this opportunity, please submit your CV via the link provided **Cubiq Recruitment is recognised as a trusted supplier of permanent, contract and interim recruitment services to AI, Software, ERP, Engineering, Manufacturing and Commercial sectors. Our teams of specialist recruiters operate across all core commercial engineering & technology disciplines and specialist areas.
